title: Wireless Headphones
description: Comfortable wireless headphones with 20h battery life. Premium sound quality with noise cancellation and ergonomic design for all-day comfort.

title: Smartphone Case
description: Slim protective case for modern smartphones. Drop-tested and scratch-resistant with precise cutouts for all ports and buttons.

title: Laptop Stand
description: Adjustable aluminum laptop stand with ergonomic design. Improves posture and increases airflow for better cooling.

title: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with precision tracking. Long battery life and comfortable grip for extended use.

title: USB-C Cable
description: Durable braided USB-C cable with fast charging support. 6ft length provides flexibility for any workspace.

title: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound. Waterproof design with 12 hours of playtime on a single charge.

title: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical keyboard with tactile switches. Customizable backlighting and programmable keys for productivity.

title: Webcam HD
description: 1080p HD webcam with auto-focus and low-light correction. Perfect for video calls and streaming.

title: Earbuds Pro
description: Premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation. Sweat-resistant design with charging case included.

title: Power Bank
description: 10,000mAh portable power bank with dual USB ports. Fast charging support for all your devices on the go.

title: Monitor 24 inch
description: Full HD 24-inch monitor with IPS panel. Wide viewing angles and accurate color reproduction for work and entertainment.

title: Gaming Headset
description: Professional gaming headset with surround sound and noise-canceling microphone. Comfortable padding for long gaming sessions.

title: Smartwatch X Pro
description: Elegant smartwatch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and customizable watch faces. Compatible with Android and iOS.

title: Tablet 10-inch
description: 10-inch HD tablet with quad-core processor and 64GB storage. Great for movies, reading, and light productivity.

title: DSLR Camera
description: Professional DSLR camera with 24MP sensor and full HD video recording. Includes lens kit and accessories.

title: Drone Mini 4K
description: Compact drone with 4K video, GPS, and 30-minute flight time. Perfect for aerial photography and videography.

title: Smart Light Bulb
description: Wi-Fi smart bulb with adjustable brightness and color. Works with Alexa and Google Home for voice control.

title: Gaming Mouse RGB
description: High-precision gaming mouse with RGB lighting and customizable buttons. Optimized for FPS and MOBA games.

title: Smart TV 43 inch
description: 43-inch 4K UHD Smart TV with HDR and built-in Wi-Fi. Supports Netflix, YouTube, and screen mirroring.

title: External Hard Drive 1TB
description: 1TB external hard drive with USB 3.0. Compact, fast, and reliable for storing backups and large files.
